title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: Parts (a) & (b) can be read together, so points may be earned for part (a) if written in part (b). It is OK to include unnecessary quantities as long as the response states the minimum required to solve for the unknown. Symbols are not scored.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes both of the following criteria.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: Procedure must use the setup as described in the prompt. Point awarded for any indication of more than one trial, even for a procedure that is not plausible. It is not necessary to list constants/controls as long as it is clear that only one variable is being changed.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes two of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes three of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes all of the following criteria.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Scoring Note: A number of pairs of variables are possible. A combination of variables must provide an algebraically sound path to the unknown AND be consistent with the setup described in the prompt.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: Parts (c) & (d) can be read together. Response must be consistent with the graph described in part (c) and include either a stated relationship with correct constants or a correct algebraic expression.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes both of the following criteria.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: Explanation not required for point.
